name: sketch on fire
description:
sketch on fire
Play as a small fire sprite in a paper world!

In 'sketch on fire' you try to get your magical flame to the end of the level. Though be careful! In a world out of paper everything will catch fire very fast and get out of control.

We are a small team of 4 people, two Artist & two programmers.
Thank you for trying our game! We hope you enjoyed what we created during this GMTK Game Jam.

Controls: WASD + Left Mouse
